attributes.action: REVISE PLANNING PERMISION FOR WINDFARMS SO THEY CANNOT BE BUILT IN AREAS OF OUTSTANDING NATURAL BEUTY IE THE ONES AT BOTHEL NEAR THE LAKE DISTRICT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
